name: Clin M
title: Clinical M
notes: **Note:**  Mucinous tumors (morphology codes 8480, 8481, and 8490) with peritoneal involvement confined to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) are classified as T4a and are assigned in primary tumor (T).
rows:
Unknown; distant metastasis not stated
Distant metastasis cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Note: M1 has subcategories of M1a and M1b. Assign M1 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories.

Stated as M1 [NOS]
Intraperitoneal metastasis beyond the right lower quadrant, including pseudomyxoma peritonei

For mucinous tumors only:
    Intraperitoneal metastasis BEYOND the right lower quadrant, including pseudomyxoma peritonei

Stated as M1a

Distant lymph nodes:
Inferior mesenteric lymph nodes
Superior mesenteric lymph nodes

For mucinous tumors only:  
Distant lymph node(s) plus intraperitoneal metastasis BEYOND the right lower quadrant, including pseudomyxoma peritonei

For non-mucinous tumors only:
    Any intraperitoneal spread

Intraperitoneal spread plus distant lymph node(s)

Non-peritoneal metastasis
Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s)

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1b
